name: In-Law Panic!
description:
IN-LAW PANIC!

CONTROLS

  • MOVE
    • Arrow Keys

RULES

Avoid moths. 

Pick up the coffee for a speed boost.

Clean up as much trash as you can before the in-laws arrive!

Hit the play button at any time to reset the game.

bio:

i made this game after frantically cleaning our apartment before my grandma came in. my girlfriend mary is the main character!
